title: The Pregnancy Journey
description: Pregnancy is a transformative experience. This guide provides essential information for expecting parents in India to ensure a healthy and happy journey.
sentences: Choose a trusted gynecologist and hospital early on for consistent prenatal care.
Focus on a nutritious diet rich in iron, folic acid, calcium, and protein.
Undergo all recommended prenatal scans and tests as advised by your doctor.
Plan your finances for delivery costs, and the baby's future needs.
Educate yourself about the stages of labor, delivery options, and newborn care.

websites.name: Ministry of Women & Child Development (Govt. Schemes)

dos: Engage in light to moderate exercise like walking and prenatal yoga after consulting your doctor.
Communicate your feelings and anxieties with your partner and support system.
Enroll in prenatal or 'birthing' classes to prepare for childbirth and parenting.
donts: Don't take any medication without consulting your doctor, including over-the-counter drugs.
Don't ignore warning signs like severe pain, bleeding, or reduced fetal movement.
Don't consume alcohol, smoke, or be around secondhand smoke.
Don't hesitate to ask for help, both during pregnancy and after the baby arrives.
